extensions.name: GeneralByte
extensions.description: Minimal utilities including phone notifications via Home Assistant, Tavily web search, and weather information
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

extensions.name: Home Assistant
extensions.description: Control and monitor Home Assistant devices including lights, switches, fans, media players, and TV remotes
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

extensions.name: Obsidian Sync
extensions.description: Syncs Obsidian vault and provides note management tools with automatic synchronization service
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

extensions.name: Quick Chat
extensions.description: Quick chat interface with agent selection or MCP server selection with LangChain ReAct agent
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

extensions.name: Todo List
extensions.description: Manage tasks and projects via Todoist REST API with full CRUD operations
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

extensions.name: ChefByte
extensions.description: Grocy inventory, meal planning, nutrition tracking, and shopping list management with AI-powered features
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

TIME_ZONE.label: Timezone
TIME_ZONE.help: 3-letter timezone code (e.g. EST, PST, MST, CST). Defaults to EST.

DAY_START_TIME.label: Day Start Time
DAY_START_TIME.help: Time when your day begins in HHMM format (e.g. 0400, 0600, 0800). Defaults to 0400.

extensions.name: CoachByte
extensions.description: Comprehensive workout tracking and planning with daily workout plans, progress tracking, weekly split management, and personal records
extensions.author: Jeremy Brinkworth

external_services.name: postgres
external_services.description: Self-hosted Postgres database suitable for Luna services and extensions.

service_definition.name: postgres
service_definition.description: Self-hosted Postgres database suitable for Luna services and extensions.

fields.name: database
fields.label: Database Name
fields.help: Primary database that will be created on first start.

fields.name: password
fields.label: Password
fields.help: Strong password used for the Postgres user.

fields.name: port
fields.label: Host Port
fields.help: Port exposed on localhost for client connections.

commands.install: mkdir -p $(pwd)/external_services/postgres/data && docker run -d --name luna_postgres --restart unless-stopped -p {{ port }}:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB={{ database }} -e POSTGRES_USER={{ user }} -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{ password }} -v $(pwd)/external_services/postgres/data:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:16-alpine

external_services.name: tailscale
external_services.description: Zero-config VPN for secure access to your Luna instance from anywhere. Installs as a native system service.

service_definition.name: tailscale
service_definition.description: Zero-config VPN for secure access to your Luna instance from anywhere. Installs as a native system service (recommended over Docker).

fields.name: auth_key
fields.label: Auth Key
fields.help: Tailscale auth key from https://login.tailscale.com/admin/settings/keys. Use a reusable key for easier management.

fields.name: hostname
fields.label: Hostname
fields.help: Hostname for this device in your Tailscale network

commands.uninstall: tailscale down 2>/dev/null || true && systemctl stop tailscaled 2>/dev/null || true && systemctl disable tailscaled 2>/dev/null || true

external_services.name: grocy
external_services.description: Grocy household management dashboard served via the LinuxServer.io container image

service_definition.name: grocy
service_definition.description: Grocy household management dashboard served via the LinuxServer.io container image.
service_definition.author: Luna Team

fields.name: port
fields.label: HTTP Port
fields.help: Host port that will forward to Grocy's internal port 80.

fields.name: timezone
fields.label: Timezone
fields.help: IANA timezone (e.g. America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Tokyo). Defaults to EST.

commands.install: docker pull lscr.io/linuxserver/grocy:latest || docker pull linuxserver/grocy:latest
commands.uninstall: docker rm -f luna_grocy 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf external_services/grocy/data
commands.start: mkdir -p external_services/grocy/data/data && ( docker container inspect luna_grocy >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker start luna_grocy || docker run -d --name luna_grocy --restart unless-stopped -p {{port}}:80 -e PUID=1000 -e PGID=1000 -e TZ={{timezone}} -e GROCY_BASE_URL=https://{{public_domain}}/ext_service/grocy -e GROCY_MODE=production -e GROCY_DISABLE_AUTH=true -v $(pwd)/external_services/grocy/data:/config lscr.io/linuxserver/grocy:latest )
